name: Continuum - PAX Aus 2016
description:
As shown at PAX Aus 2016

Website: continuumgame.net

Twitter: @ContinuumAU

CONTINUUM re-envisions the best of the arcade shooter era, and integrates it with modern visual design. Inspired by Daft Punk and Tron, the game allows the player to manipulate the game's time scale based on their vertical position on screen.

Shoot and dodge your way through waves of blocks, and enemies. Collect power-ups for extra points and to get through to the next level.

FEATURES

TIME-MANIPULATION: Vertical position determines time scale. Dodge and weave your way through!

  • POWER-UPS: Use these to endure your wave, smashing everything in your path!

  • ARCADE STYLE: Progress through harder and harder levels, obstacles get more relentless!

  • ENEMIES & BOSSES: They want to stop you, but you love destroying them back!
